field.label: Add Expire Header Enable
field.comment:
If the Cache Application is set to Varnish, this option will be ignored.
This option depends the system setting found under: Advanced -> System -> Full Page Cache -> Caching Application
Path: bin/magento config:show system/full_page_cache/caching_application

field.label: TTL for public content
field.comment: Public content cache lifetime in seconds. If field is empty default value 31536000 will be saved (+1 year).
